name: geomancy
flavor_text: The user absorbs energy and sharply raises its Sp. Atk, Sp. Def, and Speed stats on the next turn.
effect_text_extend: Takes one turn to charge, then raises the user's Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by two stages.
effect_text_simple: Takes one turn to charge, then raises the user's Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by two stages.
